20110106233606.000|20110106233608.000|CC1|OUR 0 CAMERAS INSIDE THE FAMILY 
20110106233608.000|20110106233609.000|CC1|HOME NEAR CLEVELAND WHERE THE   
20110106233609.000|20110106233611.000|CC1|ALLEGED MURDER TOOK PLACE.

20110106233612.000|20110106233614.000|CC1|WHEN THE BOY WAS TOLD TO BRING  
20110106233614.000|20110106233616.000|CC1|IN FIREWOOD FROM THIS WOODPILE. 
20110106233616.000|20110106233619.000|CC1|HE ALLEGEDLY GRABBED A .22      
20110106233619.000|20110106233620.000|CC1|EQUAL BEAR RIFLE FROM THE RACK  
20110106233620.000|20110106233621.000|CC1|IN HIS BEDROOM AS HIS MOM       
20110106233621.000|20110106233622.000|CC1|TALKED ON THE PHONE.            
20110106233622.000|20110106233625.000|CC1|>> AND HE STOOD RIGHT HERE, AND 
20110106233625.000|20110106233628.000|CC1|HE JUST POINTED IT AT HER AND

20110106233632.000|20110106233634.000|CC1|LITTLE SISTER, THEN SHE JUST

20110106233636.000|20110106233638.000|CC1|SAID, MY MOM'S DEAD, I SHOT     
20110106233638.000|20110106233638.000|CC1|HER.                            
20110106233638.000|20110106233640.000|CC1|>> THE BOY CAN BE HEARD IN THE  
20110106233640.000|20110106233642.000|CC1|BACKGROUND AS A NEIGHBOR CALLS  
20110106233642.000|20110106233642.000|CC1|911.                            
20110106233642.000|20110106233644.000|CC1|>> 911, WHAT HAPPENED.          
20110106233644.000|20110106233645.000|CC1|TELL ME WHAT HAPPENED.          
20110106233645.000|20110106233647.000|CC1|>> I SHOT HER WITH GAN.
